We use the default convergence criteria in the simulated annealing algorithm in Matlab. In particular, the algorithm is deemed to have converged if the average change in the objective function over the previous
500 ×
Problem Size
is less than 10 −6. Here,
Problem Size
is the size of the optimization problem which in the present case is
2 n − 1
. We have systematically varied these parameters and find no significant change to the estimated global minima.
